titles.title: And Can It Be that I Should Gain?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: And can it be that I should gain An interest in the Saviour's blood? Died He for me, who caused His pain? For me, who Him to death pursued? Amazing love! how can it be That Thou, my God, should die for me?
